Name: Speed And Accuracy In Text Reading
Description: Speed And Accuracy In Text Reading

Name: Speed And Accuracy In List Reading
Description: Speed And Accuracy In List Reading

Name: Chili Pili
Description: Chili Pili (find picture from four options to match just heard word)
Learning Objective: Listen and understand conversation, oral demands in a known situation

Name: Pick the correct Picture
Description: Pick the correct Picture (choose spoken word to match picture with a spoken nonword as disractor)
Learning Objective: Listen and understand conversation, oral demands in a known situation

Name: Listen and choose picture
Description: Listen and choose picture (find picture from four options to match just heard sentence)
Learning Objective: Listen and understand conversation, oral demands in a known situation

Name: Is this right?
Description: Is this right? (judge whether just-heard sentence is grammatically correct)
Learning Objective: Construct sentences with simple grammar rules

Name: Akshara Sound
Description: Akshara Sound (find akshara from four options to match just heard akshara)
Learning Objective: Learn vowels, consonants(49) and gunitakshara(the first seven) individually and in sequence

Name: Teacher Teacher!
Description: Teacher Teacher! (decide if spelling is right or wrong after listening to word)

Name: Word picture matching
Description: Word picture matching (Choose the right word to match the picture shown)
Learning Objective: Read or listen to text with simple sentences, three letter words with minimum othakshara

Name: Pick the correct word
Description: Pick the correct word (find answer to a question about a just-heard sentence from four word options)
Learning Objective: Read or listen to text with simple sentences, three letter words with minimum othakshara

Name: Word completion
Description: Word completion (fill in missing akshara from four options to make a meaningful word)

Name: Read and choose word
Description: Read and choose word (read the sentence and related questions and choose a word answer)

Name: Read and choose Picture
Description: Read and choose Picture (read the sentence and related questions and choose a picture answer)

Name: Passage Reading (fill in the blanks)
Description: Passage Reading (fill in the blanks in sentences)
Learning Objective: Read independently texts, identify the main topic, sequence of events

Name: Passage Reading (match the words)
Description: Passage Reading (match the words to the blanks in passage)
Learning Objective: Read independently texts, identify the main topic, sequence of events
